work.summary: Designing, assembling and programming embedded systems to ensure the control and optimal operation of electric vehicles.
highlights: Designed the control PCB which ensures the control and optimal operation of LEVs
Designed the power PCB which provides power rails and interfaces for the whole system
Those two modules are used in several projects such as Motosacoche, Yakbike or Pelican-train
Developed the firmwares of both modules and a custom bootloader which enables the control module to be updated through BLE
Delevoped a QT App enabling the full control and updates of the vehicules
Developed and maintained documentation
Effectively managed projects through close collaboration with stakeholders

work.summary: Worked on several projects and assisted several courses for B.S. students
highlights: Updated myLab2 platform, ran tests, wrote drivers and example firmwares (bare-metal and FreeRTOS)
Updated hepiaLight platform, ran tests, imported MicroPython and wrote modules
Developed kernel drivers (GPIOs, SPI, LCD) and user-space programs for the embedded Linux course
Made a state of art and ran tests on DRM (interfaces Linux kernel with GPUs)
Designed and manufactured SCALP high-end FPGA-based PCB and ran tests
I had the opportunity to be trained and to work with industrial machines like automatic pick'n'place, infrared oven, steam phase oven, infrared canon and solder paste printer
Assisting the logical systems, computer vision/signal processing, system programming and embedded Linux courses
